column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4976_27c3e91014d65091b096b97680b95d1b130a284d/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
Untested ACK.\n@stevenwagner can you check if this solves your problem?\n

We only need to know if it was set to anything, since an invalid setting would cause an exit before getting this far.

I suppose GetArg("-proxy", "") would be more readable?
Indeed, please do that instead. That code is already bad enough without confusing argument types :-)\n
@theuni to be clear I didn't mean to demean your code change, just that function in general \n
